name: Simorgh Storms Forth
desc: Your opponent's monsters cannot target Winged Beast monsters you control for attacks, except the Winged Beast monster you control with the highest ATK (either, if tied). Your opponent cannot target Winged Beast monsters you control with card effects, except the Winged Beast monster you control with the highest ATK (either, if tied). You can send 2 "Simorgh" monsters whose original Levels are 7 or higher with different original Attributes and this card you control to the GY; return as many cards on the field as possible to the hand, and if you do, take 500 damage for each card returned to the hand, then inflict damage to your opponent, equal to the damage you took. You can only use this effect of "Simorgh Storms Forth" once per turn.
str1: Send 2 "Simorgh" monsters to the GY to return
